forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 18C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy this afternoon. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 64F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies this evening will give way to cloudy skies and rain overnight. Low 12C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies this evening will give way to cloudy skies and rain overnight. Low 54F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High around 15C. Winds ESE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 58F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 13C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low near 55F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 17C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain early. Showers with perhaps a rumble of thunder developing in the afternoon. High 61F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 13C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 54F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 16C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning giving way to a few showers during the afternoon. High around 60F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 12C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 53F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 16C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High near 60F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 11C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 51F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 16C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 58F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. Low 51F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High 16C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High near 60F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds overnight. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear early, then a few clouds later on. Low around 50F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High near 60F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 11C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 52F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. High 16C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High around 60F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low around 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low around 50F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High 16C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional light rain in the afternoon. High near 60F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 11C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 52F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
